name: Gripper's Adventure
description: Over 40 challenging puzzles. Can you get to the treasure that lies at the end. Help Gripper get to the end of each room by collecting all the keys. Gameplay that eases you into new mechanics, that will eventually combine for more difficult puzzles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo T6400 @ 2.00GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Mobile Intel(R) 965 Express, GMA X3100 358MB Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: These requirements reflect the minimum specification computer tested.
